owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateSignalStrength(uint256).notice: Calculate signal strength for a station

frequencyToStation(uint256).notice: Mapping from frequency to station address

getListenerCount(uint256).notice: Get listener count for a station

getListenerStations(address).notice: Get stations a listener is tuned into

getStationCount().notice: Get total number of registered stations

isTunedIn(address,uint256).notice: Check if a listener is tuned into a station

lastSignalUpdate(uint256).notice: Last signal strength update timestamp per frequency

listenerCounts(uint256).notice: Mapping from frequency to listener count

signalStrengths(uint256).notice: Mapping from frequency to signal strength

stationToFrequency(address).notice: Mapping from station address to frequency

stations(uint256).notice: Array of all registered station addresses

updateSignalStrength(uint256).notice: Update signal strength (called by keeper or on interaction)
